index.description: A comma-separated list of index names; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all indices

flush.description: Specify whether the index should be flushed after performing the operation (default: true)

ignore_indices.description: When performed on multiple indices, allows to ignore `missing` ones

max_num_segments.description: The number of segments the index should be merged into (default: dynamic)

only_expunge_deletes.description: Specify whether the operation should only expunge deleted documents

refresh.description: Specify whether the index should be refreshed after performing the operation (default: true)

wait_for_merge.description: Specify whether the request should block until the merge process is finished (default: true)
